id.description: The id of the booking page.

name.description: The name of the booking page.

disabled.description: Whether the booking page is disabled or not.

duration.description: The duration of each booking, in minutes.

additionalDurations.description: Array of additional durations, in minutes

from.description: The from date of the booking page.

to.description: The to date of the booking page.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the booking page, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

slug.description: The slug of the booking page.

ignoreSharedCalendars.description: Whether the booking page slot calculation will ignore shared calendars or not.

allowAdditionalGuests.description: Whether the booking page allows the booking requester to add additional guests on a booking.

agendaTemplateName.description: The agenda template name of the booking page.

before.description: The before buffer value of the booking page.

after.description: The after buffer value of the booking page.

startTimeIncrement.description: The start time increment value of the booking page.

maxSessionsPerDay.description: The maximum sessions per day value of the booking page.

start.description: The number of minutes, counting from midnight, when the schedule has a slot starting.

end.description: The number of minutes, counting from midnight, when the schedule has a slot ending.

name.description: The name of the booking page schedule.

default.description: Whether the booking page schedule is the default one or not.

temporary.description: Whether the booking page schedule is temporary or not.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the booking page schedule, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

mon.description: The schedule hour slots for Monday.

tue.description: The schedule hour slots for Tuesday.

wed.description: The schedule hour slots for Wednesday.

thu.description: The schedule hour slots for Thursday.

fri.description: The schedule hour slots for Friday.

sat.description: The schedule hour slots for Saturday.

sun.description: The schedule hour slots for Sunday.

name.description: The name of the booking page.

duration.description: The duration of each booking, in minutes.

additionalDurations.description: Array of additional durations, in minutes

from.description: The from date of the booking page.

to.description: The to date of the booking page.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the booking page, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

bufferBefore.description: The before buffer value of the booking page, in minutes, must be multiple of 15.

bufferAfter.description: The after buffer value of the booking page, in minutes, must be multiple of 15.

maxSessionsPerDay.description: The maximum sessions per day value of the booking page.

startTimeIncrement.description: The start time increment value of the booking page, in minutes.

slug.description: The slug of the booking page.

ignoreSharedCalendars.description: Whether the booking page slot calculation will ignore shared calendars or not.

allowAdditionalGuests.description: Whether the booking page allows the booking requester to add additional guests on a booking.

agendaTemplateName.description: The agenda template name of the booking page.

scheduleName.description: The schedule name of the booking page.

name.description: The name of the booking page.

disabled.description: Whether the booking page is disabled or not.

duration.description: The duration of each booking, in minutes.

additionalDurations.description: Array of additional durations, in minutes

from.description: The from date of the booking page.

to.description: The to date of the booking page.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the booking page, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

bufferBefore.description: The before buffer value of the booking page, in minutes, must be multiple of 15.

bufferAfter.description: The after buffer value of the booking page, in minutes, must be multiple of 15.

maxSessionsPerDay.description: The maximum sessions per day value of the booking page.

startTimeIncrement.description: The start time increment value of the booking page, in minutes.

ignoreSharedCalendars.description: Whether the booking page slot calculation will ignore shared calendars or not.

allowAdditionalGuests.description: Whether the booking page allows the booking requester to add additional guests on a booking.

agendaTemplateName.description: The agenda template name of the booking page.

scheduleName.description: The schedule name of the booking page.

start.description: The start time for computing available time slots.

end.description: The end time for computing available time slots.

timeZone.description: The time zone for computing available time slots, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

duration.description: The duration used for computing available time slots, in minutes. Must match one of the durations on the booking page, or the default booking page will be used.

id.description: The id of the booking page collaborator.

bookingPageId.description: The id of the booking page connected to the booking page collaborator.

enabled.description: Whether the booking page collaborator is enabled or not.

isOwner.description: Whether the booking page collaborator is owner or not.

canTakeBookings.description: Whether the booking page collaborator can take bookings or not.

canReassign.description: Whether the booking page collaborator can reassign bookings to other collaborators or not.

canEdit.description: Whether the booking page collaborator can edit/delete the booking page or not.

priority.description: The priority for this booking page collaborator to be assigned to a booking. Has a value between 1 and the maximum number of collaborators

user.description: The user connected to the booking page collaborator.

collaboratorEmail.description: The email address of the collaborator. Collaborator must be part of your workspace, to be succesfully added.

canTakeBookings.description: Permission for the collaborator to take bookings.

canReassign.description: Permission for the collaborator to reassign bookings to other collaborators.

canEdit.description: Permission for the collaborator to edit/delete the booking page.

priority.description: The index in the list of priorities for this collaborator. Must provide a value between 1 and the maximum number of collaborators.

scheduleName.description: The agenda template name to set on the collaborator.

collaboratorEmail.description: The email address of the collaborator. Collaborator must be part of your workspace, to be succesfully added.

canTakeBookings.description: Permission for the collaborator to take bookings.

canReassign.description: Permission for the collaborator to reassign bookings to other collaborators.

canEdit.description: Permission for the collaborator to edit/delete the booking page.

priority.description: The index in the list of priorities for this collaborator. Must provide a value between 1 and the maximum number of collaborators.

scheduleName.description: The schedule name to set on the collaborator.

collaboratorEmail.description: The email address of the collaborator. Collaborator must be part of your workspace, to be succesfully added.

name.description: The name of the registration form.

enabled.description: Whether the registration form is enabled or not.

id.description: The id of the registration form item.

type.description: The type of the registration form item.

hidden.description: Whether the registration form item is hidden or not.

question.description: The question/text of the registration form item.

minLength.description: Minimum length of the answer for this registration form item.

maxLength.description: Maximum length of the answer for this registration form item.

multiline.description: Whether the registration form item is multiline or not.

isRequired.description: Whether the registration form item is required or not.

hasDescription.description: Whether the registration form item has a description or not.

settings.description: The settings of the registration form item.

choices.description: Array of registration form item choices.

minLength.description: Minimum length of a choice for this registration form item.

maxLength.description: Maximum length of a choice for this registration form item.

multiline.description: Whether a choice of the registration form item is multiline or not.

formItemId.description: The registration form item id, found on BookingPage | Event -> registrationForm -> formItems -> id.

value.description: The value for the answer to the registration form item. Data about the choices can be found on BookingPage | Event -> registrationForm -> formItems -> settings -> choices. Allowed types are boolean, string, datetime string, number and number array. Note that for 'RegistrationFormItemType'.'Dropdown' and 'RegistrationFormItemType'.'SingleChoice' types, the value must be a number, which is the index of the desired choice in the choices array, indexed from 0. For 'RegistrationFormItemType'.'MultipleChoices' type, the value must be an array of numbers representing the indices of the desired choices in the choices array, indexed from 0.

sessionId.description: The id of the session connected to the booking.

sessionLink.description: The link to the session connected to the booking.

startAt.description: The planned start time of the booking.

plannedEnd.description: The planned end time of the booking.

bookingPageId.description: The id of the booking page.

startAt.description: The planned start time of the booking.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the booking, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

duration.description: The duration of the booking, in minutes.

startAt.description: The planned start time of the booking.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the booking, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

duration.description: The duration of the booking, in minutes.

collaboratorEmail.description: The email address of the collaborator. Collaborator must be part of your workspace, to be succesfully changed.

reason.description: The reason for cancelling the booking.

bookingPageId.description: The id of the booking page.

startAt.description: The planned start time of the booking.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the booking, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

duration.description: The duration of the booking, in minutes.

startAt.description: The planned start time of the booking.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the booking, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

duration.description: The duration of the booking, in minutes.

reason.description: The reason for cancelling the booking.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the event registration, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest. Needed if a 'Date' registration form item must be answered.

active.description: Whether the room is active or not.

activeSessionId.description: Id of the current active session for this room.

sessionTemplateId.description: Id of the template session for this room.

userId.description: Id of user who is owner for this room.

slug.description: Unique room identifier to be used in the room's url. Must be unique among all rooms. If not given, an UUID will be generated.

userEmails.description: Array of user emails from your workspace to share this room with.

agendaTemplateName.description: The agenda template name of the room.

startAt.description: The planned start time of the session.

plannedEnd.description: The planned end time of the session.

actualStart.description: The actual start time of the session.

endedAt.description: The actual end time of the session.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the session, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of the session creation.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp of the last update.

startAt.description: The planned start time of the session.

plannedEnd.description: The planned end time of the session.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the session, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

startAt.description: The planned start time of the session.

plannedEnd.description: The planned end time of the session.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the session, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of the participant creation.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp of the last update.

hasRegistration.description: Whether the event has registration or not.

requireApproval.description: Whether the event registration requires approval or not.

isPublic.description: Whether the event is public or not.

accessType.description: The access type of the event.

sessionId.description: Id of the session on this event.

slug.description: Unique event identifier to be used in the event's url. Must be unique among all events. If not unique, an UUID will be attached.

startAt.description: The planned start time of the event.

plannedEnd.description: The planned end time of the event.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the event, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

startAt.description: The planned start time of the event.

plannedEnd.description: The planned end time of the event.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the event, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest.

accessType.description: The access type of the event.

registrationId.description: The id of the event registration.

email.description: The email of the event registration.

requireLogin.description: Whether the event registration requires login or not.

isSpeaker.description: Whether the person registered to the event is a speaker or not.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the event registration, in timeZone identifier format, eg: Europe/Bucharest. Needed if a 'Date' registration form item must be answered.
